(n, x) = map(int, input().split())
from collections import deque
from collections import defaultdict
dist = defaultdict(int)
d = deque()
d.append(x)
dist[x] = 0
while d:
    v = d.popleft()
    kouho = set(str(v)) - {0, 1}
    for k in kouho:
        K = int(k)
        new = v * K
        if new not in dist:
            dist[new] = dist[v] + 1
            d.append(new)
            if new >= 10 ** (n - 1):
                print(dist[new])
                exit()
print(-1)
